name: RabbInk
description:
Story/Context

The year is 85XX. All traces of human life on Earth have been eradicated.

Among all the different creatures that have risen from the ashes of humanity, the Rabbit has become one of the few dominant species that has flourished more than the rest.

However, their harsh nemesis, the Badger, has not been so lucky, as the sites they reside in have been fuming with radioactive waste, which has had many drastic side effects for them.

Whilst we’ve had sufficient power to sustain our district for the past century, we have been unable to comply with the record-breaking rise of our population. As a temporary solution, your job will be to scavenge the creatures’ spawning grounds to collect any and all radioactive energy to help fuel our progress.

You, a RabbInk, are a rare breed of Rabbit that has the natural ability to produce ink at will due to an odd mutation your ancestors have been exposed to, which is conveniently the weakness of your target. Plus, the mutation has also given natural immunity to most forms of radiation, so we won’t lose many ressources when sending you there.

It’s not like you have a choice, after all. You’ve volunteered to do community service duty in exchange of freedom, so this is your only choice if you’d like to pay back your crimes.

wish you the best of luck… not.

Goal

Survive as long as possible and collect as much radioactive waste in between waves. They will help you upgrade your weapon to survive longer.

Controls

A and D - Moving left and right

S - Swim/Submerge in ink

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Press: Shoot / Hold: Charge

Right Mouse Button - Throw Bomb

Middle Mouse Button - Activate Special

TAB - Switch weapon

Weapons and Specials

Rain-Bow : rainbow cloud that pours ink onto the battle field

Maws-Mower : Shred through hordes of creatures

Cat Control - Pin down a portion of the map to prevent enemies from approaching you

Shooter - Regular automatic shooter

Charger - Charge your weapon for a massive shot

Minigun - Charge your weapon to keep shooting for a significant amount of time

Shotgun - Single Shot weapon that deals devasting damage
